mapper.select: SELECT t.id, (SELECT s.NAME FROM stadium s WHERE s.id = t.stadiumid) stadiumname, t.name, DATE_FORMAT(t.createDate, '%Y년-%m월-%d일')createDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY t.name ASC) AS ROW FROM team t;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team(name, stadiumId, CreateDate) VALUE(#{name},#{stadiumId} , NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE stadium SET name = #{name} WHERE id =#{id}
